description: I struggled with VLC while watching webm videos. Boram helped me a lot. There is a lot of spoace to improve user interface.

It's a simple, intuitive app. For that it gets 2 stars. To get 4 stars it needed to actually do what it says it does - encode to AV1. Sadly it ships with a version of ffmpeg that doesn't have av1 encoding built in, and at the same time, it doesn't use the version of ffmpeg on my system that does have libaom-av1 support compiled in.

If the author is watching... fix it and I'll adjust the review.

works to convert video for steam deck start
Improvement on the UI can be done but get the job done
